name: Curse Dodgers
description:
What is Curse Dodgers? - A top-down arcade based game, where instead of a weapon, you get a shield that you use to block projectiles and dash into enemies to defeat them!

Controls -

  • Move: Wasd/Arrow Keys
  • Dash: Left click/Shift

Made for the Godot Wild Jam #54

(Note: Web Version has some audio delay, but works perfectly fine other than that)
